'Martin' is a small village and civil parish in the North Kesteven district of
Lincolnshire, England. It lies just north of Timberland, Lincolnshire west from
Woodhall Spa and east from Metheringham.

The village is on the western edge of the fen through which the River Witham
runs. Martin Moor is drained area to the east of the village, where there is a
golf course and a Koi Carp farm.

Martin has a Primary School and a church. The public house is the Royal Oak,
which also serves as village shop and Post Office. A small reservoir lies north-
east from the village.
